oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J.Sibiri Zoundi
L. Hitimana
K. Hussein
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper reports on an initiative aiming to stimulate analyses, collect field data and case studies that encourage debates between regional actors, with a view to informing the development of regional policies and actions in order to promote and strengthen producer access to agricultural innovation, where most producers are anchored in the family economy.
